title: Mango farm agricultural farm land - drone footage 4K

subtasks: Approach trailer with manure spreader
Attach manure spreader to tractor
Fill manure spreader with manure
Adjust spreader settings for application
Drive tractor to field
Activate manure spreader
Operate controls to distribute manure evenly
Monitor spreader and tractor operation
Adjust direction as needed during application
Stop spreader and disconnect from tractor when finished
Position tractor properly for spreading
Adjust driving speed for effective application
Understand manure composition and nutrient needs
Calculate appropriate spreading rates
Maintain spreader for optimal performance
Drive tractor safely on roads and fields
Shift gears and control transmission
Manage hydraulic systems for spreader operation
Wear protective clothing and gear
Inspect equipment for safety hazards before use
Ensure manure spreading complies with environmental regulations
Properly handle manure to prevent leaks or spills
Clean up after spreading and dispose of waste materials appropriately

tasks.task: So the breakdown should start with the main MAINTASK of MANURE SPREADER OPERATION, which includes all the steps involved in setting up and applying the manure. But to break it down further, maybe each action during the spreading process can be a subtask. Even things like adjusting the direction during application—physical steering of the tractor.
subtasks: So the output should be an organized list with MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs as per their physicality. The driving and operation of the tractor would be its own MAINTASK, with subtasks like steering the tractor, shifting gears, etc.
So with that, I think the initial list of MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs is complete, covering the physical aspects of manure spreading, tractor operation, and related safety and technical knowledge.
